summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of layout adjustments for full-screen usage and uniform spacing. All kiosk pages now properly occupy full screen width with consistent padding and clean white design.

design_issues.issue: Store name field appears empty on load, may need default value

passed_tests: Kiosk Home page uses full screen width (1920px) with no max-width restrictions
Kiosk Home page has uniform padding (80px left/right) and clean white background
E2E flow: Home -> Create Session -> Session loads QR code works perfectly
Kiosk Session page uses full screen width with consistent layout
QR code generation and display works correctly
Session ID and upload URL display properly
Print button correctly disabled when no photos uploaded
Admin page accessible via settings button and uses full screen layout
Admin form elements visible and functional with proper validation
Admin back button navigation works correctly
Print page handles invalid orders with proper error messaging
Print page back button functionality works
Mobile upload page loads correctly with session ID
Mobile upload uses appropriate max-width container (448px) for mobile
Mobile upload back to totem navigation works
Mobile upload responsive on both mobile and desktop viewports
